articles.author: Theodore McKenzie
articles.title: The Stop Killing Games Petition Soars Past 900,000 Signatures - 80 Level
articles.description: Less than 70K signatures are needed for the initiative to reach the European Parliament floor.
articles.content: For those unfamiliar, the movement was initiated in April 2024 by Ross Scott, the creator of the Accursed Farms YouTube channel, in response to Ubisoft shutting down The Crew, as well as the broader … [+1242 chars]
